sentences.sContent: a feature that allows you to browse your hard drive and choose the graphic you want to display
sentences.sCn: 让你可以浏览硬盘驱动器选择自己想要显示的图像的一个功能

synos.tran: 浏览；吃草；漫不经心地看商品

remMethod.val: brow(眉毛) + se → 眉毛般纤细的叶子 → 嫩叶

words.tran: [计] 浏览器；吃嫩叶的动物；浏览书本的人

trans.tranOther: to look through the pages of a book, magazine etc without a particular purpose, just looking at the most interesting parts
